Question
========

Save the data frame `girls` as a tab-delimited file, called girls.txt inside the folder "data". Write the `NA` as empty space, and use the specific function. Assume that all the needed packages are already loaded.

Solution
========
The specific function is `write_tsv()`, the file will be saved as `"data\girls.txt"`, and to save the `NA` as empty space we will need to specify `na = " "`. So in the end, the expession will be: `write_tsv(girls, "data\girls.txt", na = " ")`
